titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Greater Lansing Arab-American Social Services records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Greater Lansing Arab-American Social Services records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Organization established in 2004 to provide social services to the Arab and Arab-American community of the Greater Lansing, Mich., area. The organization was involved in all aspects of the economic, social, and cultural life of the Arab-American community.
archdesc.scopecontent: Grant proposals, budget material, minutes of board meetings, bylaws, needs assesment, and other materials relating to the goals and activities of the organization; also CD-ROM containing minutes, agenda, budgets, financial reports, various memoranda and policy documents.
